items.badge_description: Thanks for raising a pint of your favorite stout on International Stout Day. This day is dedicated to the celebration of this iconic beer style and its bold, malty deliciousness.
Some may call you picky, others narrow minded, but we call you loyal. Other breweries may try to tempt you, but you know what you like. Enjoy 10 beers from the same brewery in 30 days.

You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 15 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. Try 5 more for Level 4!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 15 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 4!

user.bio:
Life is too short to drink industrial beer!
Fav styles: IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA/ISA, Stout/Porter/IS/IP. New beers everyday.
Nerd * IPAholic * Recovering attorney * Terrible beer pourer
